SESSION_URL.description: session.secure public url (It is safe because it is encrypted, But still if you want maybe you can create some sort of authorization stuff)

PMPERMIT_ENABLED.description: Enable Pmpermit write true or false only

MONGODB_URL.description: MongoDB URL, Get it for free from cloud.mongodb.com

DM_DELETE_ALERT.description: show deleted messages in dm or not : ON or OFF

SPAM_LIMIT.description: limit the number of times you can spam a text using !spam : ON or OFF

GROUP_DELETE_ALERT.description: show deleted messages in a group or not : true or false

USER_BOT.description: do you want this bot to be a userbot? : true or false
